website_summaries.verdict: A 6-person inflatable floating luxury island that features a number of desirable amenities.
pros: This model has just about everything you could want in an inflatable floating island
It has a removable shade canopy, a swim platform, a spot for your cooler, and a mesh bottom to help you stay cool
Additionally, you get 6 cup holders and pillowed back rests for support
cons: Care must be taken when using the shade canopy as it can catch the wind and break

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole group!
customer_reviews.text: This bad boy easily held 8 adults and one 2 year old! I tied it to a small bell anchor to keep from drifting to the shore and away from the dock. I got the one with the canopy just because it is great to be able to have some shade if needed. The canopy does act as a sail so be aware and be prepared. I kept it out over night for 2 nights, by 3rd day it needed some more air as to be expected. Can not speak for customer service cuz haven’t had to use them. I went with intex brand bcs I have a couple of their air mattresses and have really liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Deedee

customer_reviews.title: It’s huge!
customer_reviews.text: This was a successful purchase. I was a little hesitant to buy it after reading the negative reviews but if you know how to inflate an air mattress then this shouldn’t be a problem. I used an air mattress pump to inflate it and it does the job in about 15 min. It is pretty big and it definitely can fit 8 people easily. Me and my friends had a blast on it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is so much fun. Before I bought it I talked to a ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so much fun. Before I bought it I talked to a guy at a sporting goods store and he told me this brand was going to be cheap and the plastic would be thin and would not be worth the money. So not true, the plastic is nice and thick and it is easy to get on and off. We love it and the fact that it comes with an ice chest to put your stuff in makes it even better. There is also netting where the bench seating is so you don't have to worry about falling in the water, it is the best!
customer_reviews.author: ksquared

customer_reviews.title: Subpar product and poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for $150 through VMInnovations here on Amazon. After each weekend use on the lake we deflated, dried, and stored in a cool, dry area. Within 2.5 months a seam tore and the backrest would not hold air. I called Bestway and after being put on hold for 20 minutes was informed that they provided no warranty past 30 days. This is a subpar product. You are better off buying cheaper products sold through Wal-Mart or Costco. Bestway was not even apologetic about the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Gross

customer_reviews.title: Has flaws
customer_reviews.text: These float impresses anyone who sees it, however it is almost impossible to climb up on. Last summer, we ended up doing our best to build a rope ladder to climb it. Also, it needs a very large anchor. We use a sandpak that I bought on amazon. So far, we have used it for two summers and had many people including kids all over it and have had no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We love this float and a LOT bigger then I thought it would be. The little sunshade is not made to go through a storm though it got kind of bent up. I leave it blown up at our lake house and over the last month I have not had to top it off so it's holding air well. The only downside is where the little cooler goes there is no drain so if it rains it fills up with water.
customer_reviews.author: Addict

customer_reviews.title: This thing is sweet. A little heavy but it holds a ton ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is sweet. A little heavy but it holds a ton of people and yes adults. So it should be heavy. Careful not to let water get in any of the air tubes because it’s a process to get it out. But that’s user error not product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Flaherty

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a great and durable float. Have used it for two summers already and think I will get many more summers out of it
customer_reviews.author: spendstoomuch

customer_reviews.title: Good Time Island
customer_reviews.text: Massive and stable, used with 5 adult and there was plenty of room to spare. Canopy set up quick and easy. Seems very durable. I have only used it 4 times but each time goes well. Get some paddles to go with it. The canopy does act like a sail but worth it so you can stay out longer without burning yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Easy set-up and the entire family got to enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the 1st time over the Memorial Day weekend. Easy set-up and the entire family got to enjoy it. Had 5 adults and one teenager on it and it worked great. I definitely love the canopy so I can enjoy the outside weather without being exposed to the sun the entire time.
customer_reviews.author: K. Childre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and holds plenty of people without being wobbly. I was impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Target lover

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money, don't buy this. It took 2 hours to inflate only to realize it had a small tear on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was great but...
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice when the center net tore from the float at the seams,causing it to rip and lose all the air 80 feet off shore,cooler,radio and all our dried goods were sunk,loved its design but maybe mine was defective?
customer_reviews.author: Somerandomguy

customer_reviews.title: I opened it up very excited to use this on ...
customer_reviews.text: I opened it up very excited to use this on the lake. Within the first hour the pole to the canopy broke from the wind. I sent seller feedback within a two week frame after I bought this item. I did not get a response. This island is so big packing it up and trying to return would be awful. I don't even know how much it would cost to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: It’s massive and it’s working great so far ( that’s what she said ) !
customer_reviews.text: First off we used our leaf blower to inflate this thing quickly so don’t waste the money 💴 on a pump if you have a weed blower. So far we like it after a few weeks. It is indeed massive. One flaw is the well that holds the cooler will also hold a lot of water if it rains or someone drags water up on it. They need a drain or something in this area. Make sure you order a sand bag weight with a rope on it sold here on Amazon to hold it in place if you are putting it in a lake or the ocean.
customer_reviews.author: Scott and Jessica Gearhart

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun, but has a leak in the top portion
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for a two week family vacation. Lots of fun, but has a leak in the top portion. Within an hour of opening the box and blowing it up, it was deflated. Sending it back would be a huge hassle. We will look for leak and try to patch it. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a trip to the lake last weekend. Using a standard AC inflator, it was ready to float in about 10 minutes. Erecting the canopy is a 2-person task, but not difficult. Once christened (HMS Floaty McFloatface) and launched, we anchored it in shallow water and left it floating for 2.5 days in windy conditions; the sunshade stayed put. Advertised capacity is 6, but it comfortably accommodates 9 people without losing pressure. Be advised: even after using the inflator in reverse mode to evacuate all the air, it isn't possible to compress the float enough to fit it back into the box, so save yourself the time/effort and use a garbage bag or something.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Canopy creates sailboat affect.
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of seating room. I highly suggest buying a couple paddles and an anchor. The slightest bit of wind will push you if you have the canopy attached. We had to remove the canopy to paddle and get back to shore.
customer_reviews.author: Gourmetmaiden

customer_reviews.title: This thing is so BIG and super fun. A little hard to get back on ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so BIG and super fun. A little hard to get back on but we get on and off from our dock. The canopy did come off first use but that was fine with us. Just aired up and left in water been there for almost 2 months doing great !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: we love love love this float
customer_reviews.text: we love love love this float.. we are campers and love to float on the river and this is perfet
customer_reviews.author: Tamera Padgett

customer_reviews.title: Immediate hole
customer_reviews.text: Bought this raft for a beach party. The raft got a hole in the top in the first hour we used it. I'm very disappointed considering the amount of money I paid for this.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Shade acts like a sail.
customer_reviews.text: Well..... I lost the sail the first day we took it out . We weren’t paying attention and ended up in the middle of the lake and had to be rescued . Yep it’s a sail! The shaded part seems uses anyway . It would be better if it was all float .
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE QUALITY NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: Popped after a single use, and the cover ripped after a single use.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Howard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing summer purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Took it out for the first time the other day, and we were super happy. We bought a pump that doesn’t have to be connected to an outlet, so inflating it was relatively fast. Overall setup for the first time was about 30 mins but I’m sure it won’t take that long in the future, now that we know how to do it. We also bought an anchor to keep us in place. Obviously necessary to have some paddles too. Anyway, extremely happy so far with this purchase and I’m sure we’ll get a lot of use out of it during the hot summer.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last one day!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this raft for my bachelorette weekend at the river, and unfortunately it didn’t even last one day! We were doing a float event down the river and the raft popped before we even made it to the finish line. I came on here to get a refund but wasn’t aware the window closes after 30 days... so now I’m out that money. Waste of $$$!!!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Canfield

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This thing, RIGHT out of the box would not hold air. We tried everything. We looked at all the spots where it takes air, all sealed...we thought it was expansion due to it being new - we refilled....FLAT! What a nightmare. Save yourself the amazon headache and just go get one straight from Costco because then at least you can take it back no matter what.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Wish was more durable. Ripped to easily.
customer_reviews.text: Had it out on the lake and it ripped easily. That was disappointing for the price. Other then that I love it. The top wasnt screwed down very well and lost a piece. Company sent out a new one right away.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Morgan

customer_reviews.title: A lake must have!
customer_reviews.text: We shopped around and read a million reviews before we purchased this raft. It has not disappointed us at all. We’ve used it for parties with adults, kids, etc. IT IS HUGE and it is also awesome. Be prepared to be stared at by everyone on the dock as you “launch” this bad boy into the water. We used our boat anchor and a rope and it worked perfect to keep the raft from floating away.
customer_reviews.author: The Thurman's

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: The family enjoyed using this raft during the week of July 4th. The unique "ladder" takes a little getting use to but once on the island the kids had a blast and the adults found it very comfortable to relax on. The anchor recommended to go with the island was not heavy enough so we had to find something to add to it, plus we tethered it to shore. A piece of advice, if a thunderstorm is coming, bring it to shore. We didn't, it flipped over the dock and now we have a hole to patch. Fortunately a patch was included in the box so our fingers are crossed we can set it back up.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Make Your Neighbors Jealous!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this float and have fondly named it "Big Blue"! It's super spacious and as soon as we get through the pandemic, we can't wait to invite friends and family on board to relax and enjoy our little lake with us. The first week we took it on the lake, our neighbors all came by to get a closer look on their paddle boards and kayaks asking where we got it and how much we paid. It was worth every penny. We are having a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Amy in Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Good family fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to take down a river instead of buying individual tubes. We first tried it on a lake and were impressed with how much weight it could handle.There were 2 adults and 4 kids on it. It did take awhile to inflate and deflate using a pump. We tried on the river and it was great.Even where the river was shallower then usual it floated great. It was definitely worth the price we paid. Only downside was trying to fold it all up again.It obviously didn't fit back into the box.It would be nice to have some kind of bag for it to store it in.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even make it to the lake before it started losing air. Super disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Shanon

customer_reviews.title: Actually a lot of fun and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a bayside property this past season and we got a full season's use out of it with little damage. The only negative is that the canopy is ridiculously bad and cheap engineering and it will break but the island base is quite durable and lasted outside on our beach all season. Had to tie it down because inflation took like a day :D and did not want to re-inflate it. But overall this was a really fun time for the kids and adults who used it!
customer_reviews.author: Extra Copy

customer_reviews.title: Needs strong air pump, otherwise fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: My only dislike is that you need a VERY strong air pump. We had 2 air pumps and went through SO many batteries trying to inate this bad boy. Had to give the air pumps breaks in between because they were getting over heated. Once it was FINALLY inflated though, it was great. The shade cover provided good shade and the screened area for your feet was a hit for the kids. We didnt use the built in cooler yet but I'm sure it's fine. We had 5 adults and 3 kids on it and it fit us so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla Reeder

customer_reviews.title: Great party float!
customer_reviews.text: The only issue (not really an issue) was the length of time it took to inflate. I recommend using a heavy duty air pump, if not multiple ones. If used on a busy day, I would recommend not using the canopy, as it becomes more of a sail than sun protection. I was worried that it would be difficult to climb on after a swim, but it wasn't. A few suggestions: get paddles or oars, an anchor, a water tight cooler and a heavy duty air pump! Great fun, though! Perfect for a relaxing day in the middle of the lake.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Fun once launched
customer_reviews.text: One reason we purchased this is for the shade provided by the canopy, The struts broke after one month's use and I can't find how to replace them. I would have posted this as a question but placing it here instead. For those who didn't need shade, this island was a hit, once we got it into the water. Deflating it and drying it in September was a chore. I just hope it works again this year! And that someone can tell me where to get new struts for the canopy!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Grinols

customer_reviews.title: Best Fun In 5 Years!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for wife’s “floaty” parties and they loved it compared to each one having to sit in their own floaty. Works great for 5 to 6 adults. Buy oars! 4 of them to spread out the navigation and propulsion:) Don’t use on windy days or it will year off the sunshade. It also goes with the wind in even a light breeze. Cooler works great and customer service was fabulous. We lost a plastic nut on sunshade and they sent out a replacement in 3 days! Best toy she has had in 5 years:)
customer_reviews.author: Prowlingbear

customer_reviews.title: Love island, cheap poles for canopy snapped after first use.
customer_reviews.text: Love this island, took a while filling it up with portable pump. Need something more powerful. Only issue was the first time I took it out with a slight wind the poles supporting the canopy snapped in 1/2. Had to take down canopy & throw away poles they are cheap and poorly manufactured. Now I need to buy replacements, which are not listed. The purpose of buying this island was for the canopy to shade my son.
customer_reviews.author: Melika

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: The raft is sturdy and can hold 5-6 people comfortably. Check the box before fully opening it for all the parts. It came with the attachment for the canopy but no canopy was in the box and neither was the anchor pouch. It is hard to put back in the box once it is fully opened. So you’ll need a large area to store it once you’re done using it. Also it is heavy to move around it takes at least 2 adults to move/carry the raft. I would not recommend this for a beach. Unless you have a portable air compressor. It took 1hr to inflate using a regular electric air compressor.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Pops easily
customer_reviews.text: Overall inflation wasnt terrible and the float was comfortable. But after using it 1 time with extreme caution the bottom had a hole..... which we didnt discover until the second time around - this was very disappointing. Deflating was not easy either and doesnt really fit back in the box, but that was sorta expected.
customer_reviews.author: Shalena

customer_reviews.title: Best float for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best $150 I’ve spent in a while!!! We have had this in our pool for over a month. It has not lost any air in that time. It’s nice to get out of the sun under the canopy. I do remove the canopy when it rains but it’s easy to do. Adults love it, kids love it and our Dachshund loves it. The float is super heavy so it takes two adults to put it in the pool. Definitely would buy this again at that price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S

customer_reviews.title: Came with hole. Not good for floating.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to purchase this item for a family vacation to the lake. Due to the Carona virus I purchased it well-lit advance to avoid delays. We didn't open it until we got to the lake. We blew it up and on the lake we were! Then we started to sink. There was a 1/4 inch triangle cut in the seam. So after spending $175 and looking forward to enjoying it on the lake for the week. We had nothing. VERY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: Large floater
customer_reviews.text: So we bought this to use in the lake. Kids and I inflated it and took over 1hr. Kids love it and large size. Than after 2-3hrs. It started deflating till it was not useable and the kids push it aside. In the end I see water in the tube and small rips. I thought it was just a defect. But my brother bought the same 1 and did the same. Both was return.
customer_reviews.author: Marivic G. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome flotation
customer_reviews.text: We use this flotation at the lake, and love having such a large flotation next to our swim platform for more additional sun space, or to get your feet wet without having to get your whole body wet (like on the lily pads). Love the shaded seating area as well. Seems sturdy enough, hopefully it'll last us at least a few seasons. Definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Holes
customer_reviews.text: Was sad to spend so much money on this only to find out that after 3 adults were on the float and then out of it that the thing had a hole in it. We didn’t know it was taking in water. We couldn’t drain the water from what was inside. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sunshade missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I have used this float twice and it works well - has not burst and has good capacity. However, the sunshade is missing two poles and adaptors that connect it to the float. I can't seem to find any replacement parts and can't get an answer from the Bestway company website. This is extremely disappointing as we would love to use this product without the constant fear of being sunburnt.
customer_reviews.author: Dollphyn

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: The build quality is definitely not top notch. But we bought it for our town's yearly summer party, where we put inflatable tubes in the lagoons and the bay and drink until we can't see. It stayed inflated. I think we tried it again the year after and it was a little leaky but nothing show-stopping. It's worth the price if you go in on it with some friends, it's a huge inflatable.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Ely

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Never made it in the water. Deflated within 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. After inflating all of the separate compartments, it looked amazing. We were so excited to put it in the lake. 30 minutes later we noticed the base compartment had lost some air. So we didn't put it in the water. We waited to see what happened overnight. In the morning, the base was completely flat. Tried one more time to inflate it and waited an hour. It had deflated again. Spent an hour deflating the entire thing and trying to wrap it up and get it back in the box to return it. It was a real pain in the butt!!
customer_reviews.author: Sibby'sFeedback

customer_reviews.title: Great fun and worth it
customer_reviews.text: If I never buy another single thing from amazon.. I can die happy. This is an insane pain to inflate but once you do... watch out. You are cruising in style or the lake or river or ocean. Wherever. We love it for friends trips to relax and hang. It says it fits 6but we did 8 before. Cooler.. cup holder. Need nothing more in summer
customer_reviews.author: Alex and Elise

customer_reviews.title: It's Gigantic
customer_reviews.text: Pictures don't do the size of this thing justice - it's huge. It took me about 1/2 hour to blow up with a small pump on my boat. Was a bit of a challenge to blow up and take down but kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley S.

customer_reviews.title: you will need good air compressors to inflate and enough space to complete it.
customer_reviews.text: We had 2 mattress inflators and could have used 3 but once it was inflated it was really fun. We had several children and adults that used this as home base throughout the several days of camping .... we had a small bell style anchor to keep us in place. This is a lot of fun and looking forward to using it again and again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big and Fun
customer_reviews.text: Canopy is pretty weak in the wind so count on that not lasting more than a few big wind gusts (per the 4 stars). Other than than it was really fun and durable, can fit a lot of ppl. Netted bottom for the little kids, was perfect they sat right in the bottom while we floated and enjoyed the water like a little pool.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: As expected it took forever to inflate and was lots of fun for adults and kids alike. What I didn't expect was for it to survive a night of 40mph winds + Colorado river currents. Found it inverted (shade in the water) but in place thanks to two anchors (one was included in the package). Small tear on the shade was the only damage.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Manero

customer_reviews.title: Family fun party Island!
customer_reviews.text: This island was a big hit on our family vacation. We had 7 people plus 2 big dogs on it. The only thing I thought would improve the island is a motor! We all had so much fun. Very durable dogs claws never damaged it.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Inflate, Quick to Setup
customer_reviews.text: This thing is BIG and HEAVY. It definitely fits more than 6 people without a problem. There are 6 valves to fill which took about ~30 minutes with a little $15 plug-in pump. Once it's inflated it's pretty easy to move with 2 people. We put the shade together once it was in the water due to space. It goes together kind of like putting up a tent. The cooler is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: William Garvin

customer_reviews.title: Needed it for this weekend so I am very disappointed that the raft looks nothing like the
customer_reviews.text: Just took it out of the box and did not get the raft that was pictured. Needed it for this weekend so I am very disappointed that the raft looks nothing like the ad
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Miller

customer_reviews.title: This item can hold a lot of friends.
customer_reviews.text: Set this up in my front yard to check for leaks before we go to the lake this weekend I think it is better than the one that they sell at Costco. The back rest are nice and sturdy. My wife and I both sat against one and it did not lay back. The mesh is heavy duty which is great for my little Grandson to play on and be out of the sun because it comes with a top cover
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Not worth the money or the effort
customer_reviews.text: Our float had a hole in the bottom. After patching it with the one patch that came with the float, it still not blow up to capacity and did not feel sturdy enough to rely on. We tried it in the water, but it did not retain its air well even with only one adult on it. Very disappointed that this did not live up to our expectations for our family vacation at the lake. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Krista Rasanen

customer_reviews.title: Sun Screen can't withstand even light winds.  Float's ok for a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Sun screen lasted a day. Basically, any wind 10mph or more and it's going to break. The sun screen acts like a big sail. The frame is made up of fiberglass tent-type poles, and these cracked with the wind. The first day one cracked, and I basically duct taped the pole together. The next day two more cracked, and I gave up. This is bascially a rental for a couple of weeks. Maybe if you're careful it will last the whole season. But it's not incredibly durable. Ours got a hole ripped in it after a week.
customer_reviews.author: WJC

customer_reviews.title: These things don't last long
customer_reviews.text: I bought many of these inflatable rafts. Maybe 14 of them from different brands and models. Some of them lasted only 1 day. This one had one of the headrest who was losing air from day 1. I've still kept it because it is difficult to fold and pack back in the box. And then the headrest is not so necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Franck Dossa

customer_reviews.title: Shady Warranty. Buy from someone else
customer_reviews.text: We bought this after our float had a hole on July 4th. Used it for the first time August 8th, worked great! Loved it! Brought it out of the storage tote yesterday and the main chamber has a leak so it would deflate after and hour. Reached out and since our issue is 30 days after purchase we are out of luck. 30 day warranty for a product you don’t use often is unreasonable. For a $300 item, I would recommend you buy from a seller that stands by their product and doesn’t hide behind calendar days that have nothing to do with usage and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Standifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Family Float!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a lake vacation- was perfect to float on right off the dock. Seats 6 people very comfortably. Had no problem with the cup holders (was using Contigo water bottles for drinks-fit fine). The shade worked very well but w/a strong breeze -greater than 15kph- it did cause problems w/raft floating and the shade getting pulled out of the holders. (Just dont use the shade on windy days) It was super easy to blow-up. It did require 3-4 people to carry once blown up to the water. I highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive
customer_reviews.text: Original review. Product isn't same as pictured. Colors are different but design is same. Revised. Torn at seam after 4 uses. I wouldn't recommend this product to anyone for the poor quality and craftsmanship. **The canopy also split (the bars that slide into it) when the wind blew it over.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Kids and grown-ups had a blast, but watch out for wind
customer_reviews.text: Had this on one of NY's Finger Lakes for a week - great fun, rugged. Takes a while to blow up - over half an hour with a small electric pump, but worth the effort. Just watch for wind - the sun awning acts as a sail and will blow the raft away in seconds if not securely anchored - we ended up with three 8" cinder blocks to keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: YourDadIsBroke

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used this two years in a row on our week long family trip to Panama City Beach. It’s held up well to 4 children and 6 adults. The kids (and husbands) love doing flips off the side, and it holds everyone! It’s huge and takes a few people to haul it down to the water.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: 100% glad I did!
customer_reviews.text: Love the float, the way it is built, the hole for the cooler and the netting for your feet (or pee pad if you dont want to jump in the lake ;) . The only reason I counted off a little was because you need at least 2 or 3 people to hel get it blown up and carried to your loading spot then getting it back out, cleaned up and stored. However, that is because it is AS big as it needs to be! I am 100% glad that I got it. Get you some paddles to go with it and have fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Mills

customer_reviews.title: Party time!
customer_reviews.text: This raft is awesome. Spent 3 days on the Shenandoah River camping river side, and this thing spent all 3 days in the river. It was party central for everyone from the kids, to the grandparents. It is big when deflated, so be sure that you have the means to store it and move it around.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Mahar

customer_reviews.title: Great HUGE float
customer_reviews.text: Was actually pretty easy to inflate with plug in pump given size. Held up for a weekend at the lake. Used a small anchor and left it on water all weekend. Haven’t taken it out a second time so can’t speak for how well it lasts. Was pretty Comical to get on but definitely fun to hang out on! Had 6 adults and 3 kids on comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: EO

customer_reviews.title: Strong, comfortable, easy, and fun!
customer_reviews.text: This floatilla has been a blast. We inflated it in time for the Fourth of July and it’s still functional. We had several adults and kids on it at once and it’s weathered some strong storms. We use it in a lake and try to keep it off the rocks as much as possible. At this rate it should last for several summers!
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! shipped fast
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! shipped fast. We enjoyed at river and look forward to using again next year. was able to deflate it and store in original box. The pool was great! It was so nice to be on river and stay cool in pool with the protection of not being in the river!
customer_reviews.author: Lou Ann Pack

customer_reviews.title: BUY ELSEWWHERE- this is JUNK
customer_reviews.text: This chinese made junk belongs in the trash and that is where mine is. The vinyl is so thin is tears with any touch of an object. I bought a $30.00 repair kit after 4 attempts to repair- off the the trash it goes. I believe this company sells a knock off of a better built raft. Might research other companies other than chinese made. JUNK !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HUGE
customer_reviews.text: This was Huge! It took quite some time to blow up using a portable pump, but well worth it for a river trip! Just floating along the banks this had plenty of space for people. The shade it provides was a nice plus, but does not hold up well in winds and becomes a sail. On those calm days, the cover is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product/Returned half of what I paid
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this raft and was excited to have it for Labor Day weekend with my friends at my lake house. Right out of the box it was defective; holes, so it never was inflated. We had to hustle up some water floats. This raft is huge so we just left it on the porch until everyone went home. We rolled it back up, sent it back and today I received half of what I paid for it. I have requested the rest of the original price that I paid not the selling price it is now.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Akins

customer_reviews.title: It leaked right away
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice float, but the bottom layer that keeps it afloat won't sty inflated and I can't find the leak to patch it. I had to buy a rechargeable pump to re-inflate it everyday because it is way too heavy to bring up and down from the water every time. Buyers beware
customer_reviews.author: Laura J. Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Impossible warranty claim process.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. First time out, started deflating. Found a pinhole leak. Patched. Third time out, small breeze snapped canopy pole (see pic). Tried to explore warranty options and they make it impossible. Says product number doesn’t exist (43105E). Waste of money! Want repair or refund but impossible to figure out how!
customer_reviews.author: JDub

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Our float came with hole in it. We bought it for a party and tried to use the repair kit that came with it but it didn’t work. And why should we have to use a repair kit on a brand new item?? We wanted to use it so ended up going to Ace and spending money to buy something to repair it. Once again why should we have to spend money on an already expensive float. I contacted the company and they were not helpful at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lange

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t hold air
customer_reviews.text: This took 6 hours to inflate with a compressor, it didn’t hold enough air to support 2 people for an hour, and then the main chambers deflates over night. Not sure if the valves or seems of the raft are leaking/defective-we can’t find any punctures. We would have returned this but we didn’t unbox and attempt to use it until after the return period closed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great float, weak poles for the shade
customer_reviews.text: Great float! It’s comfortable and easily holds 6 adults. However, we’ve only had the float out for 2 days and the poles for the shade have already cracked and broke making it unusable. It was a typical wind for a small pond, nothing strong.
customer_reviews.author: L Colby

customer_reviews.title: Fun lake raft!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this float! Used a cinder block and a rope for an anchor. Comfortably fit 10 people - it was a blast on the lake and easy to blow up with a basic mattress air pump. There are like 8 different sections that blow up, so there it’s firm and there isn’t a ton of stress on a small pump.
customer_reviews.author: KAZ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!! 100%worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our family beach vacation!! Can’t wait to use it again next year!! Only recommendation is to get HEAVY anchors for this float because you will drift away! We had the anchors we use for our jet skis and it wants enough! We will be buying bigger ones for next year!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Attached it to our dock and the kids spent the last 5 hours in it. The amount of fun they have already had made it worth every penny. Can’t wait for the adults to have some chill time on it later. We bought a higher end 800 W air pump and it was blown up in under 10 min. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: N. Rodda

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: Very big and can hold more people than it says. But be careful leaving it outside if it's windy. Ours popped because the canopy ripped the floatie. We enjoyed it the whole 2 times we got to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Winstead

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: We used our float one time. The next time we went to go air it up the air was coming out of the seams. So dissapointed in this product. We've had floats in the past that have lasted us for years! And to top it off the return policy is so strict.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Pain but sort of worth it
customer_reviews.text: This things a monster, it’s HUGE! We got it for our boat, but it’s a major pain to deal with while in the boat. That said, once it’s up it’s perfect to get the kids or drunk girls off the boat. Of course, once you’re ready to go, good luck deflating it and packing back up. Next time I’ll spend the money on the foam float I think.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Osserman

customer_reviews.title: Lack of replacement part availabity
customer_reviews.text: We had fun on this but only lasted the weekend of moderate use on a lake. Lost two pieces of the sunshade mounts. Attempted to contact Bestway to get replacement pieces and after being on hold, my call was dropped. They have my call back number and email, but doubtful to hear back. Will update my review if anything gets resolved. Also got two holes rather easily but I was able to patch those.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! Adults and kids love it. Four out of five stars because it was pricey and the canopy broke in the first wind storm, but we were able to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: So much fun! Holds 4 adults easy with lots of extra ...
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! Holds 4 adults easy with lots of extra space. It does hold 6 grown adults -2 Men and 4 women in our case, plus the beer and waters no problem. Easy to blow up, easy to take down - no issues with holes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I took it out into the river and it did great. I used a ryobi handheld inflator and it was inflated in 5 minutes. It held up very well to trees and rocks in the river.
customer_reviews.author: michael paez jr.

customer_reviews.title: Living Room on the Water
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hangout with the extended family on the 4th of July. It was a huge success! Stayed out on the water all day and could jump off and climb on with ease. Bring a cooler out there with you and you're set for hours of fun! We had many people stop by and ask where we got this awesome floaty, the shade is a huge bonus too incase you are sun sensitive!
customer_reviews.author: Micaela Chenault

customer_reviews.title: Durability is great
customer_reviews.text: This raft is awesome. We went to the American River 4 hour in the river and it was very durable. There's was 7 of us and the kids were jumping off it and it was fine. We got great compliments I love that it had a little pool where you sit and comes with a good durable ice chest. Good brand and for sure get paddle sticks with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great float missing the connector for the shade cover
customer_reviews.text: Love this float! We ordered it about a month ago and today was the first day we took it out of the box to put on the water since it is finally warm enough!! The only complaint I have is that it appears that that sun cover is missing some pieces. We have the poles and the shade but it needs connectors to hold the shade in place. We are going to try to get ahold of the company after the Memorial Day holiday and see if they can send us the pieces to connect the shade to the float. I will follow up with if they send us them or not.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Oasis
customer_reviews.text: Love this raft! It has turned our tiny poool into an oasis. The cup holders and cooler are great - perfect for a BBQ or pool party.
customer_reviews.author: Robert James

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable!!!
customer_reviews.text: So sad after 2 times after inflating it started to leak and the patches didn’t work either 😥 I had no kids on it only 4 adults and we were not playing around just relaxing. Big price for only getting to use twice!!! 😥
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Used this at the lake on a girls getaway. It was big and a little difficult carry with that being said it was easy to assemble and was able to fit 8 adults and my 60lb dog. I only have used it once but it seems very durable. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Saundra

customer_reviews.title: Mine was defective.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to purchase this floatie for the festival I went to, and when I went to set it up, there was a manufacturing defect, and it was missing a piece that kept me from being able to set up the shade part, and also no slot for me to insert the pole that supports the shade. I was wondering if there would be an exchange option? I really love this floatie and would love to have a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrica Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Filled it -fast and easy!! We did put it in the water and realized a seam was not intact. They sent another one in 1 day!! I was so happy and so were the kids. So far, we love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Sukkar

customer_reviews.title: Best drunk purchase I have ever made
customer_reviews.text: I do not remember purchasing this, but I will tell you right now I don't regret it. It sucks to pump up with the hand pumps (20 minutes), but it was worth all of the work. BUY AN ANCHOR FOR IT IF YOU PLAN TO USE IT ON A LAKE. Very comfortable and has a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: shayna Hulbert

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I had four (large) adults on it and it worked great. Kids also loved it. Only down side is the area where the cooler sits fills up with water but really wasn't a big deal. The kids loved to sit in it. Great price for the size. Probably took 45 minutes to inflate, there are several chambers which keeps stable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Firefly

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoyed
customer_reviews.text: Used with my wife and teenage granddaughter and it worked great! It was bigger than I thought it would be and took longer to inflate that I thought it would.... but, well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Stan pace

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: We took it out 3 times still works great very heavy need at least 4 people to put in and take out we had to use 2 twenty pound weights so it will not float away but overall we love it great investment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Bestway CoolerZ Tropical Breeze Floating Island Raft | Giant Inflatable Pool Float For Adults | Includes Canopy, Cupholders, & Cooler Bag | Lounge Fitsup to 6 People | Great For Pool, Lake, River, OC
product_meta.description: Beat the heat this summer with all of your friends on the Bestway CoolerZ Tropical Breeze 6 Person Floating Island Lounge. Featuring a built in carry along cooler and a removable canopy you can cool off in more ways then one. The all around grab line and sturdy handles with swimming platform makes getting on and off the island a breeze. Finally, the CoolerZ Tropical Breeze 6 Person Floating Island Lounge comes with extra wide pillow backrests, six cup holders, and a retractable sun shade canopy to keep the sun off your back. For more summer fun under the sun, hop on the Bestway CoolerZ Tropical Breeze 6 Person Floating Island Lounge.
feature_bullets: Perfect party float: This large floating island is the ideal solution for ultimate summer fun for adults and kids. It can comfortably fit up to 6 people with extra wide pillow backrests and built-in cup holders for each person.

Stay cool on the water: Bestway inflatable raft includes a detachable sun shade to provide the right amount of shade on a hot Summer day. Dip your feet and legs in the water for a relaxing and refreshing feel in the mesh floor area.

Keep your beverage close: 6 cup holders are strategically placed around the float, so everyone is always at arm's reach of their favorite drink. Stash beverages and ice in the convenient built-in cooler bag, so you don't have to come off the water to replenish.

Fun all summer long: The floating island's composition is made from a durable and tear-resistant PVC, so it can handle all water settings, like the beach, lake, river, or ocean. When deflated, fold it up compactly for easy storage and transportation. A heavy-duty repair patch comes with in case of accidental rips.

Everyone can use: an all around grab line and sturdy handles with swimming platform makes getting on and off the island A breeze for all swimmers. The grab line can even be used to tie yourself to other floats, anchors, boats, or Docks.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,064 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
